title: Junior Campaign Manager
content:
Teads is looking for an Ad Operations Manager based in Amsterdam, to be part of a team responsible for the set-up, optimization, performance, and general stewardship of advertising campaigns. You are the hub of digital advertising campaign execution, working closely and collaboratively with other departments. You'll be responsible for successfully managing client success across our advertising offerings.
Responsibilities
As a Junior Campaign Manager you will help manage advertising campaigns validated by the sales team and maintain daily relationships with agencies and advertisers. You will work closely and support the Account team to:

Assist in onboarding customers to our self-service buying platform or DSP
Lead preparation for campaign activation through clear and concise communication efforts with clients
Analyze performance data to highlight key trends
Set up campaign via our buying platform
Monitor the campaign pacing and performance, and make appropriate optimizations to achieve the client's KPIs
Communicate with clients proactively in terms of campaign performance and work on incremental revenue generation and post-campaign analysis
Plan and execute the end-of-campaign report presentations for key clients
Help check internal team's campaign setup, changes to ensure no mistakes in the campaign management across the team

Qualifications

1-3 years of relevant work experience at a digital media agency, publisher, SSP, DSP, or AdTech company
Vast digital media industry knowledge and vested passion in understanding how trends impact day-to-day work, such as but not limited to: Programmatic Advertising (Branding & Performance, Header Bidding and OpenRTB Protocol, etc.)
Continually promotes and achieves high standards of quality at work, applies attention to detail to execution, and constantly looks for problems to solve and ways to improve
Demonstrates comfort engaging with strategic clients, is an avid problem solver, proactive and a creative thinker
Is adept at navigating the intricacies of tactical systems and processes (e.g., third-party ad servers, verification vendor platforms, DSPs, Salesforce, etc.) 
Cultivates and maintains strong, productive relationships with various internal and external stakeholders
Takes a collaborative approach to their work; understands the limitations of their own perspective and works hard to understand the interests/views of others
Team player
Fluent English is prefered

===== Experience / Background =====

Experience and/or qualifications in marketing, social media and/or public relations.
Demonstrable interest in the field of marketing and advertising, especially in digital.
High level of motivation and initiative
Creative thinker
Organised
Willingness to learn
Additional language skills are a benefit
Very good MS-Office skills, especially in PowerPoint
Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.

===== ABOUT TEADS ======
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omni-channel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media. As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimisation technologies.
For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers. Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries
*Global reach as of October 2021
 
Please submit your resume in English
